properties.title: Maven Dashboard Report Plugin : Standard Usage for Historic support

section.name: About Standard Usage for Historic support

subsection.name: Before Starting
subsection.p: Before using, setup your project as described here: Standard Usage

p.b: The Dashboard plugin does not use an embedded database.

subsection.p: In order to use the Dashboard plugin with historic support, you have to respect the following steps :

ul.li: Install any database which is compatible with Hibernate 3.2.2 .See Hibernate doc.
Create a user having all rights on this database schema

subsection.name: Configuring the database support
subsection.p: To add database support for dashboard plugin, you must configure the plugin in the build section in the POM as :
subsection.source:
<project> [...] <build> [...] <plugins> [...] <plugin> <groupId>org.codehaus.mojo</groupId> <artifactId>dashboard-maven-plugin</artifactId>
<!--jar file that has the jdbc driver --> <dependencies> <dependency> <groupId>xxxx</groupId> <artifactId>xxxxx</artifactId> <version>xxxx</version> </dependency> </dependencies>
<!-- common configurations --> <configuration> <!-- set the hibernate dialect for your specific database --> <dialect>xxx</dialect> <!-- database driver classname --> <driverClass>xxxx</driverClass> <!-- database URL --> <connectionUrl>xxxx</connectionUrl> <!-- database username --> <username>xxxx</username> <!-- database password --> <password>xxxx</password> </configuration> </plugin> [...] </plugins> [...] </build> [...] </project>

font.b: Note 1: To be able to run the plugin you don't need to add the hibernate jars as dependency in your pom.xml
Note 2: Only Hibernate 3.2.2 supported databases can be used. See Hibernate doc.

subsection.p: To generate the site and the correct dashboard report with historic view, you must run the dashboard report plugin in 3 passes :

ol.li: let each report plugin generate its xml file.
add the dashboard report item in the left menu.
aggregate all results of each report.
aggregate all results of each report.
generate the historic dashboard HTML file with stored values in database.
